name: todobyme
description: TodoByMe is a cross-platform application for users to make and edit notes from all platforms. This is the web app version.

scripts.start: rm -rf lib node_modules ; npm install ; npm update ; tsc -p tsconfig.json ; node ./lib/index.js
scripts.test: rm -rf ./lib node_modules/ ; npm install ; npm update ; tsc -p tsconfig.json ; jest
